short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension intended to improve readability and focus capabilities on websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension aims to help people that find it hard to focus on a long text or other parts of websites by greying out everything except of a bar around where the coursor is pointed. 

To use it just click the page with according hotkey pressed on your keyboard
